articles.title: Linus Tech Tips Pausing Videos After Massive Controversy - Kotaku
articles.description: Criticism by rival channel Gamers Nexus has prompted a big apology
articles.content: Linus Tech Tips has become ground zero for accusations of conflicts of interest, sloppy testing, and rushing out too much content too quickly to feed its ever-rising ambitions. Now, the media empire … [+6385 chars]

articles.author: Lorenzo Franceschi-Bicchierai
articles.title: This $70 device can spoof an Apple device and trick you into sharing your password - TechCrunch
articles.description: A researcher built a $70 contraption designed to send pop-up prompts to nearby iPhones, which could trick targets into giving away their password.
articles.content: Attendees at Def Con, one of the worlds largest hacking conferences, are used to weird shenanigans, such as a seemingly innocuous wall of computer screens that display peoples passwords sniffed over … [+3943 chars]

articles.title: There are cyber risks in sports! Here is how to safeguard both data and fans - HT Tech
articles.description: In major sporting events like the FIFA World Cup Qatar 2022 and the Winter Olympics, cyber risks for companies and fans skyrocketed. Valuable data on athletic performance, competitive advantage, and personal information becomes an attractive target for malici…
